events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position in our backend team, and we appreciate your interest.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on your skills and experience related to software development.
A recruiter with expertise in software engineering roles has been assigned to manage your candidacy moving forward.
The initial screening of your application was completed, focusing on your experience with backend development and system architecture.
Thank you for your prompt reply confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview session next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 20th at 10:00 AM UTC with our senior engineering team.
The technical interview was completed successfully, and feedback from the engineering panel was very encouraging.
We have arranged your HR interview for April 23rd at 3:00 PM to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, and you demonstrated a strong alignment with our company values and team environment.
We are pleased to propose an official offer for the Software Engineer role, including a competitive compensation package.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
You officially accepted our offer and confirmed your start date, marking an exciting new chapter as part of our engineering staff.
Your onboarding process was initiated today, including access to development tools and introduction sessions with your new team.
The hiring process has been officially closed with your successful integration into the engineering department and first project assignment.
